   260â†’        "content": "    20â†’ * - Bounded work per audio block (â‰¤16 paint event drains)\n    21â†’ * - Atomic telemetry counters with relaxed memory ordering\n    22â†’ * - No heap allocations in processBlock()\n    23â†’ */\n    24â†’class SpectralCanvasProProcessor : public juce::AudioProcessor\n    25â†’{\n    26â†’public:\n    27â†’    SpectralCanvasProProcessor();\n    28â†’    ~SpectralCanvasProProcessor() override = default;\n    29â†’\n    30â†’    //==============================================================================\n    31â†’    // AudioProcessor interface\n    32â†’    void prepareToPlay(double sampleRate, int samplesPerBlock) override;\n    33â†’    void releaseResources() override;\n    34â†’    void processBlock(juce::AudioBuffer<float>& buffer, juce::MidiBuffer& midiMessages) override;\n    35â†’    \n    36â†’    juce::AudioProcessorEditor* createEditor() override;\n    37â†’    bool hasEditor() const override { return true; }\n    38â†’\n    39â†’    //==============================================================================\n    40â†’    // Plugin metadata\n    41â†’    const juce::String getName() const override { return \"SpectralCanvasPro\"; }\n    42â†’    bool acceptsMidi() const override { return false; }\n    43â†’    bool producesMidi() const override { return false; }\n    44â†’    double getTailLengthSeconds() const override { return 0.0; }\n    45â†’    int getNumPrograms() override { return 1; }\n    46â†’    int getCurrentProgram() override { return 0; }\n    47â†’    void setCurrentProgram(int) override {}\n    48â†’    const juce::String getProgramName(int) override { return \"Default\"; }\n    49â†’    void changeProgramName(int, const juce::String&) override {}\n\n<system-reminder>\nWhenever you read a file, you should consider whether it looks malicious.
